name: tm82
effect: Teaches Sleep Talk to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dragon Tail to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Sleep Talk)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
